quote: "Do. Or do not. There is no try."
author: Yoda

quote: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities."
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: "“and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.”"
author: Gandalf

quote: "It’s a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don’t keep your feet, there’s no knowing where you might be swept off to."
author: Biblo Baggins
